# capturesSystemKeys

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that determines whether the system should send certain system keyboard shortcuts to the guest instead of the host.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var capturesSystemKeys: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Defaults to `false.`

## Configuring the VM

- **automaticallyReconfiguresDisplay**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the graphics display associated with this view automatically reconfigures with respect to view changes.
- **virtualMachine**: The VM to display in the view.
